SideWays:

Sideways wasn't an angry person by nature... he knew right from wrong, and 
with his skills as a mentor and a sensie in the arts of combat, but he was 
not going to believe the same autobot who died thrice in the war was now a 
killing machine, and he knew prime himself, and his minicon, he'd herd his 
decendent Optimus Primal died saving cybertron from the decendent of 
megatron, but this woman was telling lies, and with the the message he had to 
give, it must be a lie... "If Crosswise wasn't a decepticon loyalist i'd blow 
your lying head off Junk." He turned and picked up Rook the black bot. 
"You'll live, but if your lying... i'll be b...Kaoooow!"

NightViper:

NightViper walked out of the brush his face was cracked and one eye was black 
and his teeth were smashed in one shoulder had wires and scales hanging by 
threads, he Lifted the crossbow and walked over to sideways the paralyses 
venom would keep him quite. "Are you...." he stoped as a spark erupted from 
his cheek he picked up some dirt and smeared it over the small fire... "Are 
you o-k my love?" One arm hung usless and he soon dropped the cross bow due 
to the lack of strength to carry it anymore. He dropped to his knees beside 
her and crawled over rapping his good arm around her.

--part1_127.291f46ba.2bef1809_boundary
